alert.note: Alert for Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:48AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lawrence and west central Wayne Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 648 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yatesville Lake State Park, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Yatesville Lake State Park, Fort Gay, Clifford, Glenhayes and Gallup. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
